jorisvandenbossche commented on a change in pull request #11814:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11814#discussion_r759641802



##########
File path: python/pyarrow/dataset.py
##########
@@ -757,10 +757,10 @@ def write_dataset(data, base_dir, basename_template=None, format=None,
         "part-{i}." + format.default_extname
     format : FileFormat or str
         The format in which to write the dataset. Currently supported:
-        "parquet", "ipc"/"feather". If a FileSystemDataset is being written
-        and `format` is not specified, it defaults to the same format as the
-        specified FileSystemDataset. When writing a Table or RecordBatch, this
-        keyword is required.
+        "parquet", "ipc"/"feather", and "csv". If a FileSystemDataset is

Review comment:
       ```suggestion
           "parquet", "ipc"/"arrow"/"feather", and "csv". If a FileSystemDataset is
   ```

   Benchmark runs are scheduled for baseline = 28e9bac8f04745e31de5cb16d2ab65eec3929410 and contender = 3dc263f4e97905bc8ac19b832bc1bc611d984d63. 3dc263f4e97905bc8ac19b832bc1bc611d984d63 is a master commit associated with this PR. Results will be available as each benchmark for each run completes.
   Conbench compare runs links:
   [Scheduled] [ec2-t3-xlarge-us-east-2](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/a5f5149fe3ca4b29a753cbf7d38b63dd...6361337a8f194dac82e6e657861fa092/)

fields.description: As noted in ARROW-14781 the "csv" and "orc" formats are not listed in a few spots in the python dataset docs.
fields.summary: [Python] csv/orc format strings missing from some dataset docs
